articles.author: Elaine Kurtenbach, Matt Ott
articles.title: US futures and world shares slip as worries over Trump's Fed chief pick and AI weigh on markets - AP News
articles.description: Wild swings that swept through financial markets overnight are calming as Wall Street opens for trading. U.S. stocks are holding relatively steady on Monday following gains in Europe and sharp drops in Asia, while gold and silver prices rallied back from seve…
